sen.j: 京都府立図書館は京都府京都市左京区にある府立図書館である。
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Library is a prefectural library located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Prefectural Library is a prefectural library located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Prefectural Library is a prefectural library located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 現在の建物は2001年5月に完成したものである。
sen.e: The present building was completed in May 2001.
The present building was completed in May 2001.
The present building was completed in May 2001.

sen.j: （1995年1月17日に起きた阪神大震災で本館建物に深刻な被害があり。1996年に新府立図書館建設基本計画を出したものである。）
sen.e: (After the main building was devastated by the Great Hanshin-Awaji Earthquake on January 17, 1995, a basic plan for building a new prefectural library was developed in 1996.)
sen.cmt: 「1996年に新府立図書館建設基本計画を出したものである。」および「）」が下の2つのセルに分散されて入っていましたが、ウィキペディアのサイトではひとまとまりのようです。
sen.e: (After the main building was devastated by the Great Hanshin-Awaji Earthquake on January 17, 1995, a basic plan for building a new prefectural library was developed in 1996.)
(After the main building was devastated by the Great Hanshin-Awaji Earthquake on January 17, 1995, a basic plan for building a new prefectural library was developed in 1996.)
1873: The Shushoin Library was opened.
1873: The Shushoin Library opened.
1873: The Shushoin Library opened.

sen.j: 1898年：京都府立図書館（初代）を開設。
sen.e: 1898: The first generation Kyoto Prefectural Library was opened.
1898: The first generation Kyoto Prefectural Library opened.
1898: The first generation Kyoto Prefectural Library opened.

sen.j: 1963年：本館の一部を京都府立総合資料館に移管。
sen.e: 1963: A part of the main building was transferred to the Kyoto Prefectural Library and Archives.
1963: A part of the main building was transferred to the Kyoto Prefectural Library and Archives.
1963: A part of the main building was transferred to the Kyoto Prefectural Library and Archives.

sen.j: 2001年：京都府立図書館（2代目）を開設。
sen.e: 2001: The second generation Prefectural Library was opened.
2001: The second generation Prefectural Library opened.
2001: The second generation Prefectural Library opened.
